name: 2D Shooter (tara-ekin)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Projects and the modifications I made are:

1. I reskinned the player (new player animation and player death animation)

2. I created 2 different enemies (with their animated states)

3. I modified all the menus and added a story to them.

Credits:
